name: Unflinching Courage
oracle_text:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature gets +2/+2 and has trample and lifelink. (Damage dealt by a creature with lifelink also causes its controller to gain that much life.)
flavor_text: As Trostani's influence grew, vitality spread through the Conclave—much to the other guilds' dismay.

name: Odious Trow
oracle_text: {1}{B/G}: Regenerate Odious Trow.
flavor_text: Trows are the vile trolls that lurk in the bogs of Shadowmoor. They reappear each night to frighten the living and gnaw the dead.

name: Red Herring
oracle_text: {1}{U}: Exchange Red Herring from your hand with a permanent you control on the battlefield or a spell you control on the stack. If that permanent or spell was the target of a spell or ability, change that target to Red Herring.

name: Champion of Wits
oracle_text: When Champion of Wits enters the battlefield, you may draw cards equal to its power. If you do, discard two cards.

name: Prowling Caracal
flavor_text: A hunter in the city requires the utmost cunning to survive. It must pounce only if the kill is certain, and leave the remains where no one will see.

name: Ghastly Remains
oracle_text:
Amplify 1 (As this creature enters the battlefield, put a +1/+1 counter on it for each Zombie card you reveal in your hand.)
At the beginning of your upkeep, if Ghastly Remains is in your graveyard, you may pay {B}{B}{B}. If you do, return Ghastly Remains to your hand.

name: Observant Alseid
oracle_text:
Bestow {4}{W} (If you cast this card for its bestow cost, it's an Aura spell with enchant creature. It becomes a creature again if it's not attached to a creature.)
Vigilance
Enchanted creature gets +2/+2 and has vigilance.

name: Eldrazi Scion
oracle_text: Sacrifice this creature: Add {C}.
set_name: Duel Decks: Nissa vs. Ob Nixilis

name: Giant Warthog
oracle_text: Trample
flavor_text: "When the Ancestor saw the cruelty her human children were capable of, Her fury shook the world. From this outburst sprang the warthogs." —Nomad myth

name: Sea Spirit
oracle_text: {U}: Sea Spirit gets +1/+0 until end of turn.
flavor_text: "It rose above our heads, above the ship, and still higher yet. No foggy, ice-laden sea in the world could frighten me more." —General Jarkeld, the Arctic Fox

name: Hecatomb
oracle_text:
When Hecatomb enters the battlefield, sacrifice Hecatomb unless you sacrifice four creatures.
Tap an untapped Swamp you control: Hecatomb deals 1 damage to any target.

name: Walk the Aeons
oracle_text:
Buyback—Sacrifice three Islands. (You may sacrifice three Islands in addition to any other costs as you cast this spell. If you do, put this card into your hand as it resolves.)
Target player takes an extra turn after this one.

name: Orcish Mechanics
oracle_text: {T}, Sacrifice an artifact: Orcish Mechanics deals 2 damage to any target.

name: Stack of Paperwork
oracle_text:
When Stack of Paperwork enters the battlefield, draw a card.
Combat damage uses the stack. (Combat damage assignment can be responded to before damage is dealt. You know, like it used to.)

name: Sorcerer's Wand
oracle_text:
Equipped creature has "{T}: This creature deals 1 damage to target player or planeswalker. If this creature is a Wizard, it deals 2 damage instead."
Equip {3}

name: Akroan Phalanx
oracle_text:
Vigilance
{2}{R}: Creatures you control get +1/+0 until end of turn.
flavor_text: Shields up, spears out, heels set, hearts firm.

name: Forethought Amulet
oracle_text:
At the beginning of your upkeep, sacrifice Forethought Amulet unless you pay {3}.
If an instant or sorcery source would deal 3 or more damage to you, it deals 2 damage to you instead.

name: Kindslaver
oracle_text: {5}, {T}, Sacrifice Kindslaver: A person outside the game controls target player during that player's next turn. Neither player may advise that person until the end of that turn.
flavor_text: "Just relax—I brought in a substitute."

name: Dedicated Martyr
oracle_text: {W}, Sacrifice Dedicated Martyr: You gain 3 life.
flavor_text: "If he's so willing to suffer for his cause, then by all means, let us oblige him." —Cabal Patriarch

name: Shaman of Forgotten Ways
oracle_text:
{T}: Add two mana in any combination of colors. Spend this mana only to cast creature spells.
Formidable — {9}{G}{G}, {T}: Each player's life total becomes the number of creatures they control. Activate this ability only if creatures you control have total power 8 or greater.

name: Syr Gwyn, Hero of Ashvale
oracle_text:
Vigilance, menace
Whenever an equipped creature you control attacks, you draw a card and you lose 1 life.
Equipment you control have equip Knight {0}.
flavor_text: Squires throughout the realm aspire to her mix of panache and martial prowess.

name: Masterful Ninja
oracle_text:
Haste
Reveal Masterful Ninja from your hand: Masterful Ninja is on the battlefield and in your hand until end of turn.
{1}{B}: Masterful Ninja gets +1/+1 until end of turn.

name: Roalesk, Apex Hybrid
oracle_text:
Flying, trample
When Roalesk, Apex Hybrid enters the battlefield, put two +1/+1 counters on another target creature you control.
When Roalesk dies, proliferate, then proliferate again. (Choose any number of permanents and/or players, then give each another counter of each kind already there. Then do it again.)

name: Ulvenwald Captive // Ulvenwald Abomination
type_line: Creature — Werewolf Horror // Creature — Eldrazi Werewolf

card_faces.name: Ulvenwald Captive
card_faces.flavor_text:
"Even on a plane as dark as this one, nature will organize a defense against the unnatural."
—Nissa Revane

card_faces.name: Ulvenwald Abomination
card_faces.flavor_text:
"The Eldrazi are all too practiced at twisting natural into unnatural."
—Nissa Revane

name: Game Plan
oracle_text:
Assist (Another player can pay up to {5} of this spell's cost.)
Each player shuffles their hand and graveyard into their library, then draws seven cards. Exile Game Plan.
flavor_text: Plan for victory, or prepare for defeat.

name: Selesnya Sagittars
oracle_text:
Reach (This creature can block creatures with flying.)
Selesnya Sagittars can block an additional creature each combat.
flavor_text: "What's their strike range, you ask? Let's put it this way: sagittars aim their bows using maps." —Otak, Tin Street shopkeep

name: Sultai Emissary
oracle_text: When Sultai Emissary dies, manifest the top card of your library. (Put that card onto the battlefield face down as a 2/2 creature. Turn it face up any time for its mana cost if it's a creature card.)
flavor_text: To the Sultai, Ugin's power was just one more resource to be exploited.

name: Chainbreaker
oracle_text:
Chainbreaker enters the battlefield with two -1/-1 counters on it.
{3}, {T}: Remove a -1/-1 counter from target creature.
flavor_text: Scarecrows deemed too malevolent to roam free are shackled to boulders or dolmen stones. Their animosity usually outlives the chains.

name: Sedge Sliver
oracle_text:
All Sliver creatures have "This creature gets +1/+1 as long as you control a Swamp."
All Slivers have "{B}: Regenerate this permanent."
flavor_text: Their flesh is as sodden as the fens in which they live, oozing to fill any wound and squishing to absorb any blow.

name: Glacial Fortress
oracle_text:
Glacial Fortress enters the battlefield tapped unless you control a Plains or an Island.
{T}: Add {W} or {U}.
flavor_text: Ships blown north in their voyage across the Stormwreck Sea become trapped in the unmelting ice.

name: Odunos River Trawler
oracle_text:
When Odunos River Trawler enters the battlefield, return target enchantment creature card from your graveyard to your hand.
{W}, Sacrifice Odunos River Trawler: Return target enchantment creature card from your graveyard to your hand.

name: Wings of Aesthir
oracle_text:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature gets +1/+0 and has flying and first strike.
flavor_text: "For those of courage, even the sky holds no limit." —Arnjlot Olasson, sky mage

name: Soulsworn Jury
oracle_text:
Defender (This creature can't attack.)
{1}{U}, Sacrifice Soulsworn Jury: Counter target creature spell.
flavor_text: In death, as in life, they protect the Grand Arbiter from exposure to contrary points of view.

name: Guardian of Tazeem
oracle_text:
Flying
Landfall — Whenever a land enters the battlefield under your control, tap target creature an opponent controls. If that land is an Island, that creature doesn't untap during its controller's next untap step.

name: Puppet Conjurer
oracle_text:
{U}, {T}: Create a 0/1 blue Homunculus artifact creature token.
At the beginning of your upkeep, sacrifice a Homunculus.
flavor_text: He scowls at his imperfect creation, then crushes it to scrap. He salvages the etherium and begins anew.

name: Scourge of the Throne
oracle_text:
Flying
Dethrone (Whenever this creature attacks the player with the most life or tied for most life, put a +1/+1 counter on it.)
Whenever Scourge of the Throne attacks for the first time each turn, if it's attacking the player with the most life or tied for most life, untap all attacking creatures. After this phase, there is an additional combat phase.

name: Rewards of Diversity
oracle_text: Whenever an opponent casts a multicolored spell, you gain 4 life.
flavor_text: "Everything is in place. Nothing can happen that isn't part of my plan." —Urza

name: Warp World
oracle_text: Each player shuffles all permanents they own into their library, then reveals that many cards from the top of their library. Each player puts all artifact, creature, and land cards revealed this way onto the battlefield, then does the same for enchantment cards, then puts all cards revealed this way that weren't put onto the battlefield on the bottom of their library.

name: Half-Squirrel, Half-
oracle_text:
Whenever a nontoken creature enters the battlefield,
Augment {G} ({G}, Reveal this card from your hand: Combine it with target host. Augment only as a sorcery.)

name: Earthcraft
oracle_text: Tap an untapped creature you control: Untap target basic land.
flavor_text: "The land gives up little, but we are masters of persuasion." —Eladamri, Lord of Leaves

oracle_text:
Flying
Whenever Skysovereign, Consul Flagship enters the battlefield or attacks, it deals 3 damage to target creature or planeswalker an opponent controls.
Crew 3 (Tap any number of creatures you control with total power 3 or more: This Vehicle becomes an artifact creature until end of turn.)

name: Pillar of War
oracle_text:
Defender
As long as Pillar of War is enchanted, it can attack as though it didn't have defender.
flavor_text: Just because a temple has no guards doesn't mean it's undefended.

name: Stronghold Machinist
oracle_text: {U}{U}, {T}, Discard a card: Counter target noncreature spell.
flavor_text: She stretches the laws of physics until they snap.

name: Pyre Charger
oracle_text:
Haste
{R}: Pyre Charger gets +1/+0 until end of turn.
set_name: Duel Decks Anthology: Jace vs. Chandra
flavor_text: His blade was forged over coals of moaning treefolk, curved at the optimum angle for severing heads, and heated to volcanic temperatures by his touch.

name: Storm Crow
oracle_text: Flying (This creature can't be blocked except by creatures with flying or reach.)
flavor_text: Storm crow descending, winter unending. Storm crow departing, summer is starting.

name: Walking Sponge
oracle_text: {T}: Target creature loses your choice of flying, first strike, or trample until end of turn.
flavor_text: Not only does it catch fish, it cleans them too.

name: Ravnica at War
oracle_text: Exile all multicolored permanents.
flavor_text: The heart of Ravnica disappeared before anyone could strike a blow in its defense.

name: Urborg, Tomb of Yawgmoth
oracle_text: Each land is a Swamp in addition to its other land types.
flavor_text:
"Yawgmoth's corpse is a wound in the universe. His foul blood seeps out, infecting the land with his final curse."
—Lord Windgrace

name: Twilight Mire
oracle_text:
{T}: Add {C}.
{B/G}, {T}: Add {B}{B}, {B}{G}, or {G}{G}.
flavor_text: As their roots soaked in a weak tea of bogwater and decay, the trees absorbed the essence of death into their living tissue.

name: Honored Hydra

Trample
Embalm {3}{G} ({3}{G}, Exile this card from your graveyard: Create a token that's a copy of it, except it's a white Zombie Snake Hydra with no mana cost. Embalm only as a sorcery.)
flavor_text: Even gods have pets.

name: Declare Dominance
oracle_text: Target creature gets +3/+3 until end of turn. All creatures able to block it this turn do so.
flavor_text:

—Gar-Tun, Mistvalley silverback

oracle_text: At the beginning of your upkeep, put a land card from your library chosen at random onto the battlefield.

name: Armored Wolf-Rider
flavor_text: Wolf-riders of Selesnya apprentice from a young age. Each rider raises a wolf pup from birth to serve as a mount, hoping that one day the two will share the honor of guarding the Great Concourse.
